Name: Ancient Heart Fragment
FlavorText: When the scattered fragments converge to form a heart, an overwhelming power awakens.
Description: When Asura lands a critical attack, there is a 7{0}% chance to stun the target for 1 sescond, dealing additional damage equal to 3{1}% of the enemy's max HP.

Name: Auxillary Propeller
FlavorText: Unlimited warranty available
Description: Decreases the ATK SPD reduction caused upon moving locations by 10{0}%.

Name: Axe of Onslaught
FlavorText: Breaks things in half
Description: Increases all monsters' ATK by 15{0}%.

Name: Banana
FlavorText: Big Hand only eats bananas with 100% sweetness
Description: Throws a banana peel that reduces the MOV SPD of enemies within a 1 range by 30{0}%.

Name: Blue Nutrient Injection
FlavorText: High in Vitamin C
Description: Reduces Surprise Mouse's exhaustion duration by 1{0} sec.

Name: Cintamani Stone
FlavorText: They say there were seven Cintamani Stones in ancient times
Description: Dragon's Roar adds an additional 20{0}% critical damage boost.

Name: Crystal Blade
FlavorText: Demons use this as a paring knife.
Description: Increases all monsters' CRIT RATE by 10{0}%.

Name: Demon Core
FlavorText: Demon Demon Fruit
Description: All monsters gain 20{0}% of ATK as additional boss DMG.

Name: Dragon Heart
FlavorText: Devote your heart!
Description: Magma Blast becomes a projectile that deals 1{0} AoE DMG.

Name: Executioner's Goggles
FlavorText: It allows you to see through weakness
Description: Executes enemy with 10{0}% HP or lower when attacking (Bosses and criminals are not executed).

Name: Eye of the Evil Eye
FlavorText: They say Evil Eye has a 50/10 vision
Description: Increases the base projectile attack range of all demons by 0.5{0} (excluding Ice Knight and Phantom Slime).
Notes: Once the attack range barely covers a section, the attack will fully reach.

Name: Goblin Bank Contract
FlavorText: The joy of completing a mission, plus a bonus!
Description: Mission rewards are increased by 10{0}%.

Name: Gold Bat
FlavorText: Make it rain gold!
Description: When obtaining Gold through skills, the Gold is also granted to allies with 25{0}% chance.

Name: Gold Coin
FlavorText: Hard to distinguish from a Coin Man
Description: Increases starting Gold by 15{0}.

Name: Golden Arrowhead
FlavorText: This arrow must be retrieved at all costs
Description: Fires arrows in three directions with 10{0}% chance when attacking.

Name: Golden Hat
FlavorText: The epitome of capitalism
Description: On attack, there is a 7{0}% chance to throw a coin pouch, dealing 200{1}% ATK to enemies within a 1.5 range around the target.

Name: Hidden Golden Key
FlavorText: Treasure cherished most by Mimics
Description: Obtains 10{0}% more currency from Mimic chests.

Name: Ice Necklace
FlavorText: A necklace that contains a blizzard
Description: Summons a blizzard every 120{0} sec, freezing all enemies on the field for 3{1} sec.

Name: Lucky Dice
FlavorText: You can have Rare monsters too!
Description: Summons a rare monster with 5{0}% chance when summoning.

Name: Magic Stone Elemental
FlavorText: The soul of a Magic Stone Slime
Description: Obtain 1 Magic Stone with 10{0}% chance when enemy is killed.
Notes: Any enemy is killed, not just by Phantom Slime.

Name: Monk's Necklace
FlavorText: Always maintain a calm heart
Description: `Mind's Eye` inflicts additional damage equal to 2{0}% of the enemy's max HP.

Name: Mysterious Boulder
FlavorText: They say that boulder worship has been practiced since ancient times
Description: Increases stun duration by 1{0} sec.

Name: Oni Brazier
FlavorText: Oni fires are hard to put out
Description: Ignites the enemy for 5 sec when attacking, dealing damage equal to 1{0}% of their current HP every second.

Name: Pearl of Blood
FlavorText: Draxar is mad for blood
Description: When an enemy is instantly kiled, attack speed increases by 100{0}% for 5{1} seconds.

Name: Rabbit Bomb
FlavorText: Rabbits in late-night dreams... That must be scary.
Description: Every 8{0} seconds, a Rabbit Bomb is placed at a random location nearby. The Rabbit Bomb explodes after 5{1} seconds, detonating all time bombs within a 1.5 range.

Name: Shadowe Contract
FlavorText: Contracts made within the shadow are unbreakable.
Description: A tile is bound to the shadow contract (only once). Monsters summoned on tiles with shadow contract have 5{0}% chance to absorb 1 soul upon attack.

Name: Sharp Claw
FlavorText: It hurts more if you hit the bone
Description: Increases all monsters' CRIT DMG by 20{0}%.

Name: Slime Negotiation Form
FlavorText: Even slimes have rights
Description: Reduces the cost to hire Magic Stone Mining Slimes by 10{0}%.

Name: Slime Pickaxe
FlavorText: Pickaxes made by dwarves are renowned for their performance
Description: Increases Magic Stone mining speed by 10{0}%.

Name: Slush Fund
FlavorText: Monster replacement on sale!
Description: Reduces monster replacement cost by 10{0}%.

Name: Soul Orb
FlavorText: It is said that monsters experience astral projection upon death.
Description: Grants monsters within range of 1, 50{0}% increase to their ATK.

Name: Special Warrior Badge
FlavorText: A badge given exclusively to marksmen with perfect aim
Description: Increases ATK by 0.5{0}% every time an enemy is defeated.

Name: Super Fusion Machine
FlavorText: A surprise with every merge!
Description: Summons a monster two tiers higher with 5{0}% chance when merging (Supreme Demon God excluded).

Name: Thorn Tombstone
FlavorText: It stings if you get pricked by a thorn
Description: Deals DMG equal to 10{0}% of the target's current HP to enemies that collide with the [Tombstone].

Name: Till Death Do Us Part
FlavorText: A White Wig for Eternal Love
Description: If Growing Scallions fails, there is a 20{0}% chance to retain the current upgrade.

Name: Totem of Worship
FlavorText: Demon Gods become stronger the more they are worshipped
Description: Adds an additional effect that increases CRIT RATE by 10{0}% to Wind Voodoo.

Name: Wind Feather
FlavorText: Speed battle begins!
Description: Creates a zone that increases ATK SPD by 10{0}%.

Name: Wind's Blessing
FlavorText: Have you ever been to the Windy Hills?
Description: Increases all monsters' ATK SPD by 5{0}%.

Name: Zephyros' Feather
FlavorText: The more HP is reduced, the fuller the wallet becomes
Description: Obtain 20{0} additional Gold whenever HP is reduced.
